mapper.sql: C.LOK_KD as lok_kd, C.DIVISI_KD as divisi_kd, C.SUBDIV_KD as subdiv_kd, C.DEPT_KD as dept_kd, C.LOK_NM as lok_nm, C.PROPINSI as propinsi, C.KOTA as kota, C.EMAIL as email, C.F_TUTUP as f_tutup, C.TGL_TUTUP as tgl_tutup, C.CTR_PPUC as ctr_ppuc, C.MAX_CTR_PPUC as max_ctr_ppuc, C.CTR_BATCH as ctr_batch, C.MAX_CTR_BATCH as max_ctr_batch, C.CTR_REALISASI as ctr_realisasi, C.MAX_CTR_REALISASI as max_ctr_realisasi, C.CURR_CTR_DATE as curr_ctr_date, C.SYS_USER_UPDATE as user_update, C.SYS_TGL_UPDATE as tgl_update, C.SYS_JAM_UPDATE as jam_update, C.SYS_USER_CREATE as user_create, C.SYS_TGL_CREATE as tgl_create
